name: scons.vim
description:
Syntax file for SConscript or SConstruct, configuration files of the build tool SCons.

http://www.scons.org/
install_details:
1. Copy scons.vim into the directory ~/.vim/syntax/ 
2. Add the following line to ~/.vimrc 
au BufNewFile,BufRead SCons* set filetype=scons

You may also add syntax support for Scons* or scons* files.
